p: Cryptocarya impressa Miq. is native to Vietnam, Laos, the Malay Peninsula, Borneo and Sumatra [ 23]. In Vietnam, the plant has been recorded in Hòa Bình, Hà Nội, Hải Dương, Ninh Bình, Nghệ An, and Gia Lai provinces [ 14]. To our knowledge, there have been no reports on the phytochemistry of C. impressa.
